amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network within the Treasury Department by $25.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase (by transfer) the amounts available for "Financial Crimes Enforcement Network--Salaries and Expenses" by $25,500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kelly amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 360 - 37 (Roll no. 454).
